name: Infomercial vs SaaS Hero Comparison
description: A comparative educational layout analyzing the structure of a homepage hero section by drawing parallels to classic infomercial techniques, featuring annotated examples and a summary list.

render.html:
Write your homepage hero
like an infomercial

Capability put the tape on the hole
Benefit stop the leak
Feature super strong, waterproof tape
Problem you have a hole gushing with water
Problem meetings are bad
Capability update your team
Feature: quick videos
Benefit reduce meetings by 29%

Loom on.
Meetings off.

Record quick videos to update your team and cut down meetings by 29%

In 5 seconds, we learn...

  • what it is
  • what does it do
  • what problem it solves
  • when would I use it
  • how would I use it
  • why would I use it
Fletch
render.notes: I used CSS pseudo-elements (::before and ::after) to create the straight annotation arrows pointing to the images, allowing for precise positioning without extra HTML clutter. For the curved arrows connecting the sections, I used inline SVGs. The images are replaced with patterned placeholder divs to maintain the visual weight and layout.
